messages: I bet you eat pizza with a spoon.
You look like you struggle to open velcro shoes.
Your internet speed is slower than a snail on a salt lick.
I'd agree with you, but then we'd both be wrong.
You are the reason shampoo bottles have instructions.
I bet you clap when the plane lands.
Somewhere out there is a tree working very hard to replace the oxygen you waste.
You have the perfect face for radio.
Your secrets are safe with me... I wasn't listening.
I bet you remind the teacher about homework.
You bring a calculator to a spelling bee.
